message.body: So. There's this restaurant on passyunk I wanna try. It takes like 2 months to get a reservation. Let's go! Lol
Oh wow. Our passyunk? Haha I'm in.
Why don't I know about this place? Hmm
Lol idk laur. The portions looks dinky though. They have a tasting menu on Friday and Saturday. It's 85 a person though I almost fainted.
During the week is a regular menu. Check it out. Let me know
Omg that insane. Okay I'll look at it when I get a chance later on today but you know I love good food. Maybe we just won't do tasting but the price is probably relative
Yeah. Don't forget to look at their pics. Lol the portions look kinda small :( that's the only thing that sucks
That's nothing new haha remember some of the tiny portions we used to get at some places
